name: eq.php
title: Solo Developer
shortDes: eq is a function library developed to make outputting HTML a breeze in PHP
section1:
eq.php is an open source PHP library that makes it easy to output well-formatted HTML webpages

I created it to make it really simple to dump gorgeous output without mucking around too much with HTML everyday (as much as I love that), and instead make my life easier with functions.

It's available on my github, and installable via Composer.
